mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(order_ymd) AS month, SUM(order_sum) AS income_sum, order_ymd FROM order_info GROUP BY MONTH(order_ymd)

SELECT SUM(oing.ingredient_cnt * oing.ingredient_price) AS recipe_income, oing.recipe_nm FROM order_ingredient oing INNER JOIN order_info odi ON oing.order_no = odi.order_no AND MONTH(odi.order_ymd) = #{month} GROUP BY oing.recipe_no ORDER BY recipe_income DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT oing.ingredient_nm, (SUM(ingredient_cnt)*ingredient_price) AS ingredient_income FROM order_ingredient oing INNER JOIN order_info odi ON oing.order_no = odi.order_no AND MONTH(odi.order_ymd) = #{month} GROUP BY ingredient_nm ORDER BY ingredient_income DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT SUM(odi.order_sum) AS income_sum, odm.member_id FROM order_member odm INNER JOIN order_info odi ON odm.order_no = odi.order_no AND MONTH(odi.order_ymd) = #{month} GROUP BY odm.member_id ORDER BY income_sum DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT order_no, order_ymd, order_sum, paytype, member_id, member_join FROM order_info LEFT JOIN (SELECT order_no, member_id, member_join FROM order_member LEFT JOIN member USING(member_id)) me USING(order_no) WHERE member_id = #{searchKeyWord}
ORDER BY order_ymd DESC
